_header: Saint Cuthbert was I-bore here in England
Subjects: saints’ lives; Cuthbert, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Cuthbert in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Cubert was ibore her in engelondeGod dude uor him uair miracle
                    as ȝe scolle vnderstonde…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…& to þe Ioie of heuene god let ous ek also&
                    þoru þe bone of seynt Cutbert bringe ous alle þerto

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint cotbert was I bore here in ingelondegod dede many fayr
                    merakles as ich ȝit ondirstonde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…In to þe grete ioye of heuene god lene vs don also&
                    þorwȝ þe bone of seint cotbert bring vs alle þer
                    to
Bod779.Editions:
Fowler,  Joseph Thomas,
                        ed.  
             The Life of St Cuthbert in English Verse, c. A.D 1450 from the original
                MS. in the Library at Castle Howard.
Surtees Society
         87 (1891): 3, 5, 7, 9.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Cuthberd was i bore her in EngelondeGod dude for him Miracle
                    gret as we schulle vndurstonde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…To þe Ioye of heuene God lete vs alle goÞorwh
                    þe bone of seint Cuthbert come þulke ioye to. A.M.E.N.

                    miracle ase ȝe schulle under stonde…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:

                    alsoÞoruȝ þe bone of Seint Cudbert þat we moten comen
                    þar to

BodTan17.Last Lines:

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Cubert was ibore here in EngelondeGod ende for him vair
                    miracle as ȝe ssolleþ understonde…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…To þe ioie of heuene god lete us ek alsoAnd þoru
                    bone of sein cubert bringe us alle þerto

CamFitzMc128.First Lines:
Saint Cuthbert was borne in englondGodde did for him fair miracle
                    as ȝe shul vnderstond…
CamFitzMc128.Last Lines:
…To the Ioie of heven god graunt vs all sothruȝ praier of
                    saint Cuthbert that we may com therto

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Cuthbert was ybore here in EngelondeGod dude ffor him ffayre
                    miracles as ȝe shulleþ vnderstonde…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Þo he hadde longe yserued god after him he sendeVn to
                    þe ioye of heuene þer to dwelle wiþ outen ende

BLAdd10301.First Lines:

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Cuthbert was born here in EnglondGod did for him fayre
                    myracle as ȝe shul vnderstonde…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…To þe ioye of heuen god graunte vs alle soÞurȝ
                    prayer of saynt Cuthbert þat we may come þerto Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Cutbert was yborn here in EngelondGod did for him faire
                    miracle as ȝe shulde vnderstonde…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…To þe ioie of heuene/ god leue vs alsoThorgh preier of
                    seynt Cutbert/ we mowe come þerto. Amen.
TokyoTak54.Attributed Title:
And here bygynneþ þe lif of seint Cutbert (f.
                    36v)
